welcome.subtitle: Here's an overview of your properties and manuals
welcome.title: Hello, {{name}}!

properties.title: My Properties
properties.subtitle: Manage and organize all your properties from one place
properties.noProperties: You don't have any properties yet
properties.createFirstOrGroup: Create your first individual property or consider creating a group
properties.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete the property "{{name}}"? This action cannot be undone.
properties.deleteError: Error deleting property. Please try again.
properties.searchPlaceholder: Search properties by name, city or state...

propertySets.title: Property Groups
propertySets.infoDescription: Groups combine properties that belong to the same building, hotel, complex or resort. Ideal for managing multiple apartments in the same place with shared information.
propertySets.createGroupDescription: Create a group to bundle multiple properties under the same management

zones.title: Zones of {{name}}
zones.subtitle: Manage the different zones and their QR codes to enhance your guests' experience
zones.createFirstDescription: Add zones with instructions so your guests have all the information they need.
zones.designCustom: Design a fully customized zone with your own name and icon
zones.duplicateZoneError: A zone with the name "{{name}}" already exists. Please choose another name.
zones.zoneCreatedMessage: The zone "{{name}}" has been created successfully
zones.errorCreatingZoneMessage: Could not create the zone. Please try again.
zones.zoneDeletedMessage: The zone "{{name}}" has been deleted successfully
zones.errorDeletingZoneMessage: Could not delete the zone. Please try again.
zones.errorCreatingEssentialZones: Could not create the essential zones
zones.allPredefinedExist: You already have all predefined zones
zones.errorCreatingPredefinedZones: Could not create the predefined zones
zones.orderUpdatedMessage: The zone order has been saved successfully
zones.errorUpdatingOrder: Could not update the zone order
zones.qrScanMessage: Guests can scan this QR code to access the instructions for this zone.
zones.qrPropertyScanMessage: Guests can scan this QR code to access the complete apartment manual.

propertyForm.newPropertyDescription: Create a new property to manage its digital manuals
propertyForm.translationsOptional: Translations are optional. If not completed, guests will see the text in Spanish.
propertyForm.descriptionPlaceholder: Describe your property in a few words...
propertyForm.descriptionPlaceholderEn: Describe your property in a few words...
propertyForm.descriptionPlaceholderFr: D√©crivez votre propri√©t√© en quelques mots...
propertyForm.mainPhotoDescription: This will be the main image of your property in the dashboard. It will be automatically optimized.
propertyForm.completeRequired: Complete all required fields to continue
propertyForm.addressAutocompleteInfo: Start typing the address and select from suggestions. City, state and postal code fields will be automatically filled with verified information.
propertyForm.contactInfoDescription: This information will be used so guests can contact you directly from the manual when they need help.
propertyForm.profilePhotoDescription: This photo will appear when guests contact you
propertyForm.whatsappDescription: Guests will be able to contact you via WhatsApp
propertyForm.sessionExpired: Your session has expired. Please log in again.
propertyForm.invalidServerResponse: The server responded with an invalid format. Please reload the page and try again.
propertyForm.requestTimeout: The request took too long. Please check your connection and try again.
propertyForm.contactSupport: If the problem persists, contact support.
propertyForm.unsavedChanges: Are you sure you want to leave? Data will be saved automatically.

propertyZones.inactiveProperty: Inactive Property - Not visible to guests
propertyZones.inactiveDescription: This property is currently inactive. Guests will not be able to access the manuals until you activate it.
propertyZones.inactiveRecommendation: Complete all zones with their instructions before activating the property to offer the best experience to your guests.
propertyZones.propertyActivatedMessage: Your property is now visible to guests
propertyZones.instructionsSavedMessage: Your instructions have been saved successfully
propertyZones.changesSavedMultiple: Changes to "{{name}}" have been saved in {{count}} properties
propertyZones.errorSavingMessage: Could not save the instructions. Please try again.
propertyZones.zoneCreatedWithContentMessage: "{{name}}" has been created with professional text in ES/EN/FR. Just edit with your data!
propertyZones.connectionErrorMessage: Could not connect to the server
propertyZones.propertyNotFoundMessage: The property you are trying to access does not exist or has been deleted
propertyZones.essentialZonesCreatedMessage: We have created the essential zones for you. Now you can complete them with specific information.
propertyZones.inactiveWarningMessage: Your property is inactive. Guests will not be able to see it until you activate it. Complete the zones and activate it when ready.
propertyZones.zoneIncompleteMessage: The zone "{{name}}" only has {{count}} step(s). Consider adding more information
propertyZones.zoneEmptyMessage: The zone "{{name}}" has no configured instructions
propertyZones.errorReportedMessage: A guest reported that the WiFi code is not working in the zone "{{name}}"
propertyZones.welcomeMessage: Your digital manual is ready. Check the notifications to optimize it
propertyZones.zoneCreatedForSet: A new zone has been created for the entire group
propertyZones.zoneCreatedForProperties: A new zone has been created for {{count}} properties
propertyZones.zonesDeletedFromSet: "{{name}}" has been deleted from the entire group

analytics.title: Performance Analysis
analytics.subtitle: Detailed metrics for all your properties

insights.lowVisits: Only {{count}} visits - consider improving its content

reviewsTab.noZoneRatingsHint: Ratings will appear when guests rate the zones

evaluations.noEvaluationsFiltered: No evaluations match this filter for this property.

gettingStarted.title: Getting started
gettingStarted.createFirstPropertyDesc: Start by creating your first property to manage its zones and content
gettingStarted.multiplePropertiesDesc: If you have several properties in the same place, consider creating a group

recommendations.title: Recommendations
recommendations.dailyDescription: Daily tips to get the most out of Itineramio and improve your guests' experience

share.title: Share link
share.tip: Share this link with your guests so they can access your property's interactive manual from any device.
